channel.title: Request for a new board
channel.description:
I request a new software board, i have seen this on a couple other forums and they all are very successfull. here are the rules from one of the forums.
1. No Torrents. 2. [B]No[/B] viruses (virus = IP ban and no money back!) 3. Downloads must be on a website with limited popups such as mediafire and uppit. 4.No debating or Extreme Flaming 5. we tolerate some language but when it gets hardcore you may get muted or let off with a warning. 6.All users must include a virus scan
there are no rules saying i can't request a board [quote="Taharok, post:1, topic:277227"]This board is more lenient on rules, so make sure you take full advantage of it. Some things you might want to remember: [ul][li][url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,354311.0.html]Global forum rules[/url] apply[/li] [li]Try to treat everyone the same, this board is not meant for flaming each other[/li] [li]This board is not meant for questions, please post those [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,145.0.html]here[/url][/li] [li]No pornography please[/li] [li]No warez[/li] [li]No extremely grotesque images (this includes anything we classify as spam)[/li] [li]No forum games[/li] [li]No requesting 'coders', hosters, or development teams in this section/General Questions.[/li] [li]No more "leaving", "sympathy", or "coming back" topics (but introduction topics are still allowed and encouraged :))[/li][/ul] This board is only here because you people have finally deserved it. Don't make us change our minds. ;)[/quote] EDIT# another reason for a new board like this is becaue of people posting this crap http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,397826.new/boardseen.html#new torrents are a waiste of time

item.title: Request for a new board
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

no, that’s not what im saying, what i ment was post torrent files without the torrent, i and a few others will take torrent requests and we will take the time to virus test them and see if they are allowed. why not listen will you?

Read full topic

WE ARENT GOING TO POST PAID PROGRAMS FOR FREE.

Read full topic

it’s only mopar’s decision.

item.title: Request for a new board
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

hmmm, well that’s a little dissapointing, what about keycodes and such? because “Warez” files are what i ment, i am actually starting a whole website based on the stuff and i need some stuff like these “warez” files

Read full topic

item.title: Request for a new board
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

You can’t post adobe photoshop, or paid programs that you normally have to pay for.

Read full topic

item.title: Request for a new board
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

no, it would be full version software, basicly what most people would do is make a torrent file that takes forever to download and make it a .zip file. it would help alot without the ammount of time torrents take to download. you could make it a temporary board for a while and we could see what it’s like

Edit# plus it would help with things like modeling software ( i already got an adobe photoshop extended $999 file ready to upload)

Read full topic

item.title: Request for a new board

item.title: Request for a new board
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

I request a new software board, i have seen this on a couple other forums and they all are very successfull. here are the rules from one of the forums.

1. No Torrents. 2. [B]No[/B] viruses (virus = IP ban and no money back!) 3. Downloads must be on a website with limited popups such as mediafire and uppit. 4.No debating or Extreme Flaming 5. we tolerate some language but when it gets hardcore you may get muted or let off with a warning. 6.All users must include a virus scan
there are no rules saying i can't request a board [quote="Taharok, post:1, topic:277227"]This board is more lenient on rules, so make sure you take full advantage of it. Some things you might want to remember:

[ul][li]Global forum rules apply[/li]
[li]Try to treat everyone the same, this board is not meant for flaming each other[/li]
[li]This board is not meant for questions, please post those here[/li]
[li]No pornography please[/li]
[li]No warez[/li]
[li]No extremely grotesque images (this includes anything we classify as spam)[/li]
[li]No forum games[/li]
[li]No requesting ‘coders’, hosters, or development teams in this section/General Questions.[/li]
[li]No more “leaving”, “sympathy”, or “coming back” topics (but introduction topics are still allowed and encouraged :))[/li][/ul]

This board is only here because you people have finally deserved it. Don’t make us change our minds. ;)[/quote]
EDIT# another reason for a new board like this is becaue of people posting this crap http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,397826.new/boardseen.html#new
torrents are a waiste of time

Read full topic
